name: Abyss Story
description:
(In development) An surreal adventure game about a man who looks for his sister in the soul dimension with wacky strange and sometimes dangerous souls along the way.

Features - Battles where you use puzzle solving to bribe enemies, strange towns and worlds to explore, and many abilities using "artifacts" changing your appearance as well (Exclusive limited time artifact is available until game is completed)

CONTROLS

  • Arrow Keys / WASD to move
  • Z / J to interact
